Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mercure Montpellier Centre Antigone in Montpellier (Antigone), you'll be minutes from Esplanade de l'Europe and close to Comedy Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of FNAC Montpellier and Polygone Shopping Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 114 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have separate bathtubs and showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Mercure Montpellier Centre Antigone. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Montpellier? This hotel has facilities measuring 2260 square feet (210 square meters), including conference space. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Mercure Montpellier Centre Antigone. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Esplanade de l'Europe - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
FNAC Montpellier - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Polygone Shopping Center - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

Pavillon Populaire - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Montpellier Town Hall - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Champ de Mars Garden - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Esplanade Charles de Gaulle - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Corum Convention Center - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Comedy Square - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Languedoc Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Fabre Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Opera House - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Pharmacie de la Misericorde - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Montpellier (XPJ-Montpellier SNCF Train Station) - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Montpellier (MPL-Montpellier - Mediterranean) - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Montpellier Centre Antigone is Montpellier (MPL-Montpellier - Mediterranean).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Mercure Montpellier Antigon is Montpellier (MPL-Montpellier - Mediterranean) - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi.
